metadata.title: QUIPU-DECODE Analysis: Cornell AS10 Administrative Quipu
metadata.author: Dr. Guilherme de Camargo
metadata.abstract: Comprehensive analysis of Inca administrative quipu using QUIPU-DECODE Framework v1.0 with Î£-Kernel deductive reasoning. Results indicate high cognitive scaffolding requirements and sophisticated information encoding system.

cognitive_analysis.interpretation: High working memory load suggests quipu functions as cognitive scaffolding; High information density indicates efficient encoding system; Moderate structural complexity suggests hierarchical organization

narrative_hypotheses: High cognitive load suggests specialized training required
Structural complexity indicates hierarchical data organization
